text_block_list.text:
At the end of Summer Training Camp, Satono Crown stopped me, 
saying she had something she needed to talk to me about.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
Do you have a moment? For the question I'm about 
to ask, can you give me an honest answer please?

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
……Trainer. 
Do you……have any interest in what's beyond the ocean?

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
(After such a grueling summer camp, 
a statement that hints at a challenge overseas……)

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
(In addition to that, they already know that I'm 
going to Hong Kong because of our shopping trip)

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
(Good! It's perfect, if I do say so myself! With this, it should 
properly convey that I want to go to Hong Kong together……!)

If she was going out of her way to ask me after training 
was over, then she must want to keep this private.

Beyond the ocean……so she's asking about traveling 
abroad……? In that case, I didn't have any plans 
to go abroad anytime soon. So my answer is――

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: (Alright, Trainer! Let's go together――to Hong Kong!)

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
What!? No, wait――――
…………

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: (No……I can't force the issue, definitely……)

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
…………I see. 
I guess it can't be helped. ……Thank you.

It was a bit unusual, but she seemed to be worried 
about something. I wonder if something happened…… 
I suppose I'll keep an eye on her for a while.

It was with that in mind that dinner approached. 
……but Satono Crown was nowhere to be found.

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text:
……Kura-chan is it? Ummm……huh? 
We just came out of the common room though?

If she's not in the common room……then maybe she went outside? 
Did she not tell anyone where she was going?――

Now that I think about it, when we were talking about 
traveling abroad, she seemed to have something on her mind……

Maybe she made her way back to the beach from this afternoon. 
It was nighttime but I still made my way there. Then――

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: ……Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: Sorry. I just wanted to enjoy the evening breeze……

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
(As I thought. Trainer always seems to 
be able to find me no matter where I go……)

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
(They noticed. So we are communicating properly. 
They trust me……there's no mistaking that)

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: …………during the next long break, I plan on going to Hong Kong.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
While helping with Papa's business, I plan on making use of 
the Satono family's exclusive training facilities over there.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: But really, I――

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: ――wanted to go together with Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
Fufuu. I even made plans on the assumption 
that we'd be going together……

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
Having you help me with intensive training. Seeing some of the 
races in Hong Kong. ……And if possible, running in a few.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
And then……seeing the sights with 
Trainer, visiting Papa's stores…………

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: I know it was really presumptive of me……

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
Without even hearing your thoughts, 
just getting swept up in the moment……

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
Up until now……even today was like that. 
I kept naively thinking 『Trainer would understand』.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
……But, today made me realize…… 
that maybe this was for the best……

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
Don't worry! Even if I'm on my own, 
I'll show you that I can still grow in Hong Kong!

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
That's why, while Trainer's staying here…… 
you can think of the best training menu for the future me♪
choice_data_list: If possible, I want to go too

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: Eh……?

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: But……you said you didn't plan to…………

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: Y-you did! Today, in the afternoon――

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
……Trainer. 
Do you……have any interest in what's beyond the ocean?

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: Back then, you said 『I don't plan on going』……
choice_data_list: Sorry, I thought you meant a vacation……

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: Eeeh!? There's no way――

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
Huh……but, I suppose……? It could be misunderstood 
that way…… I guess……I didn't convey it properly……

For my part, before, I spent so much time desperately trying to 
read her intentions that I never even asked about her feelings.
choice_data_list: We both need to talk more, huh?
We both need to talk more, huh?

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
You're right. Trust isn't all about knowing without speaking 
to each other……Being able to say it out loud……is important too.
choice_data_list: In that case, in regards to Hong Kong――

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
choice_data_list: I want to go as your trainer
I want to go as your trainer

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: …………Fufuu.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: Right. Let's go together――to Hong Kong!

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
……Then, I guess I'll have to adjust my plans, huh? 
I made adjustments assuming you wouldn't come.
choice_data_list: Ah, I don't have the notepad with me

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
No problem! There's always the sand. 
Let's write out all our ideas here!

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
For visiting Hong Kong, gourmet food is important 
isn't it? Near Papa's offices, there's a recommended 
dim sum restaurant we can go to!

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
And the night view is something you can't miss. And 
if we're going to be there for a while, we definitely 
need to see Victoria Harbor! And then there's――

After that, we spent the summer night scribbling 
plans for Hong Kong in to the sand until we could 
barely walk without stepping on them.
